title: Mimir.Ending.potential
body:
I see there’s more to you than meets the eye.
You may very well have the potential to be of use to me… 
I mean, to achieve your goals…

[[Monrjiall.Ending.awaits]]

title: Monrjiall.Ending.awaits
body:
Of course I do. 
The Gods have no idea what awaits them.

[[Mimir.Ending.join]]

title: Mimir.Ending.join
body:
Very well... 
I will join your quest and assist you in every way I can...
until I’m safely back at Odin’s side.

[[Monrjiall.Ending.revenge]]

title: Monrjiall.Ending.revenge
body:
And I have exacted my revenge on all Asgard!

[[Mimir.Ending.ofcourse]]

title: Mimir.Ending.ofcourse
body:
Mmm? 
Oh, yes, of course, that as well.

<<set $mimirObtained to true>>
